title: Episode 169: Ian Brady & Myra Hindley AKA The Moors Murderers Part 4
description:
This week wraps up Alaina’s four part series on the monster/garbage people, Ian Brady and Mryra Hindley. Don’t worry, this part isn’t nearly as rough as the past few weeks. We go over Ian and Myra’s secret coded messages, take digs at the demise of their relationship and get to hear all about the end of their stupid rude lives! 

Books used in this episode: Ian Brady:The Untold Story of the Moors Murders By Dr. Alan Kneightly

Evil Relations By David Smith & Carol Ann Lee

Depraved: The Moors Murders By C.G.C. Cook

The Monstering of Myra Hindley By Nina Wilde


As always, thank you to our sponsors:
